entry.def: When someone such as a politician or an official who has been elected is re-elected, they win another election and are therefore able to continue in their position as, for example, president or an official in an organization.

example.ex: The president will pursue lower taxes if he is re-elected...
example.tran: 如果再度当选，总统将推行减税政策。

example.ex: ...Ramon Mendoza was re-elected president of Real for a third successive four-year term...
example.tran: 拉蒙·门多萨再度当选为皇马主席，这是他连续第3次当选这个任期为4年的职位。
